org.apache.calcite.adapter.spark

Class SparkRuntime

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.apache.calcite.adapter.spark.SparkRuntime

  • public abstract class SparkRuntime
extends Object
    Runtime utilities for Calcite's Spark adapter. Generated code calls these methods.
